sources.title: Ladies Who Do
sources.description: Title: Ladies Who Do Summary: The "Ladies Who Do" are office cleaners. One of them discovers some hot stock tips and they make a fortune. They then make good use of it to save their old neighbourhoods from the wicked developer. Directed by: C.M. Pennington-Richards Actors: Production Company: George H. Brown Productions Release Date: 22 June 1964 (Sweden) Aspect Ratio: REMOVE_TAG The "Ladies Who Do" are office cleaners. One of them discovers some hot stock tips and they make a fortune. They then make good use of it to save their old neighbourhoods from the wicked developer.

metadata.Plot: The "Ladies Who Do" are office cleaners. One of them discovers some hot stock tips and they make a fortune. They then make good use of it to save their old neighbourhoods from the wicked developer.
metadata.Actors: Peggy Mount, Robert Morley, Harry H. Corbett
